verbose_text: Alternatively, it has been reported that LXR SUMOylation and NCoR may be dispensable for gene repression by LXR, and certain anti-inflammatory activities of LXR may reflect the metabolic functions of LXR targets, including the cholesterol efflux transporter ATP binding cassette transporter A1 (ABCA1).
evidence: cholesterol efflux transporter ATP-binding cassette transporter A1
